name: Power Attack
player_battle_text: You swing hard at your enemy.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy swings hard at you.

name: Patch Up
player_battle_text: You apply a bandage to one of your wounds.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy pauses to bandage one of his wounds.

name: Accumulate
player_battle_text: You flex your muscles, focussing your strength.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy flexes her muscles, focussing her strength.

name: Break Armor
description: Damage a piece of your enemy's armor to reduce her Defense.
player_battle_text: You aim at a piece of your enemy's armor and swing.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy sends a blow right for a piece of your armor.

name: Vital Shot
player_battle_text: You fire off a well-aimed arrow at your enemy.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy sends a piercing arrow your way.

name: Healing Herb
description: Apply healing forest herbs to stop bleeding.
player_battle_text: You apply some healing forest herbs to one of your wounds to stop the bleeding.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy pauses to apply a poultice to her wounds.

name: Limber Up
description: Raise your Dexterity by taking a moment to warm up.
player_battle_text: You take a moment to stretch and warm up.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy pauses stretch and warm up.

name: Hand Shot
description: A shot to the hand do reduce Attack accuracy.
player_battle_text: You fire an arrow towards your enemy's hand.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy fires and arrow towards your hand.

name: Fireball
description: A ball of fire is thrown at the enemy.
player_battle_text: You throw a ball of fire at your enemy.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy throws a ball of fire at you.

name: Cure
description: Use magic to restore your body.
player_battle_text: You channel divine energy into your body, restoring it.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy channels divine energy to restore his body.

name: Focus
description: Raise your Intelligence by clearing your head of distractions.
player_battle_text: You take a deep breath and focus on the task at hand.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy takes a moment to collect his thoughts.

name: Tether
description: Magically anchor your enemy to the spot so they cannot Evade.
player_battle_text: You tether your enemy to the ground she stands on.
